long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove verified tweets from your Twitter feed without having to block/silence each user everytime you see it, allowing only those you do want to see to appear on your feed, responses, etc.

Some included features:
- A little button next to the profile name allows you to whitelist a user.
- You can choose to see business verified by default.
